info.game_comments: Alex wears a phony mustache for the Jeopardy! Round.

double_jeopardy_round: LET'S RUN IT UP THE FLAGPOLE

(3, 4).clue: In 1861 she received a Tiffany seed-pearl jewelry set from her husband

(4, 4).clue: Because they were too inexperienced or low in rank for the cavalry, foot soldiers came to be called this

(1, 1).clue: "Cartesian" refers to the ideas of this man, the "Father of Modern Philosophy"

(4, 1).clue: We were both at a meeting of this organization founded in 1957 for those who can't stay away from gaming
